page.title: 05SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content:
{ Shenfield}is a small but busy {commuter town}with one main street. There are{2 free car parks, 35 free {street parking and 2 large fee paying {rail commuter car parks. { Half-Day closing}is on{Wednesday. } The{Library}is closed all day on Wednesday as is the Body Wear shop, Masegroves (shoe shop) and Harleys (furniture shop). { 23%}of inhabitants visit the High street{daily.}These are made up of {elderly and young mothers with babies. It is used on{once-a-week basis}by {OAP.'s}from surrounding villages. The busiest day is{Saturday.}Two small supermarkets serve local inhabitants. Affluent members of society have their weekly goods made up and delivered.
{(CONTINUED ON NEXT PAGE.)}
